name: Ilium
description:
SUMMARY
Fight to win dominance over the circular arena in Illium - Try to shoot the other player into the blue hole. Charge up your shot to give it extra power! Collect the power-ups to give you a new ability for a short time.

Ilium was created for a 48 hour GameJam called 'BluJam'. The aim of the Jam was to introduce aspiring creators to try to create a game using only the default ecs library.  The theme of this Jam was 'Blue'.

Ilium was created entirely in 'Processing' by a team of 4. The only modifications made to the game after the jam was minor bug fixes.

CONTROLS

PLAYER 1
Movement / Jump - 'WASD'
Charge Shot - 'SPACE'

PLAYER 2
Movement / Jump - Arrow Keys
Charge Shot - ' . '
